item.title: Mask lower triangle of a Representational Dissimilarity Matrix (RDM)
item.description: This recipe takes a Representational Dissimilarity Matrix (RDM) as a square numpy array, masks the diagonal and lower triangle, and outputs a flattened numpy array of the upper triangle.
